snippet.title: FAIRY TAIL: DUNGEONS （deck building roguelite） Trailer
snippet.description:
Steam Link： https://store.steampowered.com/app/2305500/

FAIRY TAIL: DUNGEONS is a deck building roguelite that features FAIRY TAIL characters. 
The 5 playable characters include Natsu, Lucy, and Gray, each with special abilities. 
Collect magic cards from the original FAIRY TAIL to make decks, and defeat powerful monsters to reach the deepest part of the dungeon.




【Original Story】
Natsu and Happy find a mysterious door that suddenly appeared below the guild.
On the other side of that door lies a strange dungeon that robs any intruders of their abilities. 
There they are saved from monsters by Rabi. Together they try to reach the deepest part of the dungeon to find Rabi’s friends.

【The Labyrinth (Solo Dungeon)】
Actions are performed by selecting attack, defense, magic, etc. from a deck of cards on hand.
Strengthen your deck by acquiring magic cards from battle rewards and treasure chests.
Aim for massive damage with Magic Chain, which is triggered when cards are used in a specific order.

Even if you lose the battle, you can use the points gained from the exploration,
Amulets that will give you an advantage in the next dungeon.
Try again and again without giving up.

【Character】
Each character has his or her own fighting style and specialties.
Choose between Natsu, Lucy, Gray, Erza, and Wendy. 
Go for balanced offense and defense with Natsu, show off the special effects of Celestial Spirit magic with Lucy, 
or use the strategic and colorful Molding magic of Gray.
Determine each character's fighting style and techniques to gain the upper hand in the battle.

【Deep Labyrinth (Team Dungeon)】
A party of three characters, trained in the solo dungeon, will aim for the deepest part of the dungeon.
In the dungeon, you can acquire grimoires that can strengthen your party's stats.
The final boss was specially designed by Hiro Mashima himself.

－－－－－－－－－－
